description:
Luffy and his gang continue on their way to Marineford, but once he arrives, the rubber-man must defeat both Navy Admirals and Warlords of the Sea before he can save Ace!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: A Special Retrospective Before Marineford! The Three Navy Admirals Come Together!
Juste avant Marine Ford ! Les souvenirs de Luffy. Les trois amiraux se rassemblent.
Marineford Chokuzen Kaisou Special: Shuuketsu! San Taishou
Сбор всех сил Дозора! Три адмирала!
حلقة تذكيريّة خاصّة قبل مارينفورد: اجتماع أميرالات البحريّة الثّلاثة!
海軍本部直前回想特別編 集結! 三大将
